nodes.text: A male archaeologist was the father of the Ithorian collector Dok-Ondar. Ondar's father was previously a gardener on Ithor until they became archaeologist. During or prior to 0 ABY, the Ithorian's father and mother died. Ondar took their belongings and notes and looked to continue their archaeological adventures. During a mission to locate the Sword of Khashyun on Moraband, Ondar stressed to Doctor Chelli Lona Aphra, the importance of the sword to his parents but Aphra did not care for them.
